listitem.para: Outputs a three element list of numbers that represent the red, green, and blue intensity of the pixel currently under the turtle. For an explanation of colorvector see Using Color. See also SETPIXEL.
Pixel can be used in PERSPECTIVE mode but the pixel seen will be what ever is under the turtle in the 2D projection.

listitem.programlisting: CLEARSCREEN SHOW PIXEL [255 255 255] FORWARD 1 SHOW PIXEL [255 255 255] BACK 1 SHOW PIXEL [0 0 0]
